name: Present Preparation
description:
The goal of this game is to wrap as many presents as possible in 2 minutes. There are 3 preparation areas:

  1. Wrapping - The goal of this area is to line up the scissors with the line and then get the power bar to as high as possible. (Press Space to lock in the scissor's position and then press Space again to lock in the power in the power bar).
  2. Ribbon - In this section, you need to use the mouse to drag the ribbon around the present.
  3. Bow - The aim of this area is to line up the position of the bow with the grey marker. The bow will move from side to side and when you're ready, press Space to lock in its position.

These areas will repeat until the timer runs out. You will get points for each section:

  1. Wrapping -
    1. The scissors will give up to 500 points based on how close you are to the line.
    2. The power bar will give you up to 500 points based on how high the metre is.
  2. Ribbon - This will give you 50 points for each ribbon completed.
  3. Bow - This will give you up to 1000 points based on how close it is to the marker.

You will also get 250 points for every completed present. To complete a present, you must complete all 3 areas.
